text:
Amy Stiller (born August 9, 1961) is an American actress, stand-up comedian and Bikram Yoga instructor.
Early life.
She was born in New York, New York. She is the daughter of the Jewish-American comedians Jerry Stiller and Anne Meara, and the older sister of actor Ben Stiller. She graduated from the United Nations International School, in New York City, in 1979.
